channel.title: Hacker News - English
channel.description: Hacker News articles summarized and translated to English

item.title: Mock – An API creation and testing utility: Examples
item.description:
$ mock serve -p 8000 --base example. $ curl localhost:3000/python # Prints out: Hello from Python. $ curl localhost:3000/php # Prints out: Hello from PHP.

Read more

item.title: Your URL Is Your State
item.description:
They’re state containers. The question isn’t whether URLs can store state. Before we dive into examples, let’s break down how URLs encode state.

Read more

item.title: HyperRogue, the non-Euclidean roguelike, is a mind-melting masterpiece
item.description:
Or just ignore your quest and collect smaller treasures. A very infinite world With more space than anything Euclidean. Play together with your friend (shmup mode is recommended).

Read more

item.title: Context engineering
item.description:
This expanded, more structured practice is what we now call "context engineering. We might hope that this will "trick" the LLM into generating more accurate answers, but this hope rests on linguistic probability and offers no guarantees. This enabled LLMs to produce completions that displayed "knowledge" of probable token sequences based on novel structures in the prompt, rather than just remembered patterns from their training dataset.

Read more
